feed.title: Infuse Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.12.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.12.0

Bug Fixes

  • album list fix (1132a04)
  • gemini response and query fixes (1b986a8)
  • minor design fixes (9bd314f)

Features

  • added bulk share links generation (5b2b779)
  • added option to group by albums for missing locations (bb6ffeb)
  • moved db config from url to individual keys (a3e12c8)
  • multi select in potential album and missing location using shift key (4820f35)
  • option to bulk delete albums (fdda358)

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.13.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.13.0

Bug Fixes

  • conflicts resolved (18274a3)
  • minor condition fix (e7687b9)
  • minor design fix (b60660f)
  • removed unused components (59fb16b)

Features

Shared Links
  • added option for link expiry (d5c6f0a)
  • people selection in share link (1fea9cc)
  • shared album links (34f32e4)

For using shared links you need to setup two things.

  • IMMICH_SHARE_LINK_KEY: A new API key to be created and added to your ENV for fetching images as a public user.
  • POWER_TOOLS_ENDPOINT_URL : Now Immich Power Tools can work like proxy for your immich instance when using shared links. So inorder to show the domain of the shared links you need to set this env. This should point to the public hostname of your power tools.
  • JWT_SECRET : Also a JWT Secret to encode the filters applied to shared links and also validate the expiry. If you already have it for old authentication method, it can be reused.

Other Features

  • added proper validations for errors with messages (9fcda54)
  • bulk delete in find page and find page clean up (2150aca)
  • option to delete assets from missing locations page (098701b)

  • people search added (29f80b8)

  • unified album creation and option to delete assets from potential albums (72dcb92)

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • If one element is already selected - make it easier to select more by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/126
  • Feature: Added OpenStreetMap Search (Missing-locations) by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/92
  • Feature: Update UI after location assigned (Missing-locations) by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/103
  • Feature: scroll date from querystring into view (Missing-locations) by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/98
  • Feb Release by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/136

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.15.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.15.0

Bug Fixes

  • improve error handling in search API and log response from Gemini (d47916d)

Features

  • add healthcheck configuration to Docker Compose files (997246d)
  • add search functionality to PeopleList and AlbumPeople components (5db6e41)
  • enhance person management with merge functionality (57c9bd2)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0
